item.title: Chain of Execution Supervision Promotes General Reasoning in Large Language Models
item.description: arXiv:2510.23629v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Building robust and general reasoning ability is a central goal in the development of large language models (LLMs). Recent efforts increasingly turn to code as a rich training source, given its inherent logical structure and diverse reasoning paradigm...<br><br><small><strong>Source:</strong> arXiv | <strong>Keywords:</strong> vision, model, chain-of-thought, step-by-step, large language model | <strong>Relevance:</strong> 100%</small>
item.author: noreply@contextengineering.news (arXiv)

item.title: ThinkSound - [NeurIPS 2025] PyTorch implementation of [ThinkSound], a unified framework for generating audio from any modality, guided by Chain-of-Thought (CoT) reasoning.

item.title: cosmos-reason1 - Cosmos-Reason1 models understand the physical common sense and generate appropriate embodied decisions in natural language through long chain-of-thought reasoning processes.
